message:
SYSTEM: OntoDDB.pdf: Página 20
PROBLEMS: Blank nodes
• Name (URI) as identifier for resources 
– In statements communication with external applications
– In repository (statements table)
• Anonymous resources have no name
– Internal names change in each Protégé session
– Impossible to link old and new names
• Solution:
– Anonymous resources considered as changed resources 
in save changes mode
– Namespace: Anonymous
– Penalty on the first storing of each session
12/11/2009
speaker: SYSTEM
